name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red color reminiscent of the famous rossoCorsa shade, Circuit stands out in any crowd. Its retroConsole buttons add a touch of nostalgia, while its foundry arms and legs provide strength and durability. Circuit's laser screen allows it to display precise visual representations of electrical signals. With its unique combination of retro charm and advanced technology, Circuit is a valuable member of the WebtrES club.
